name: Send a message on Slack from a new response in Survey123
description:
Every time a new survey response is created in Survey123, a message containing the survey responses will be sent on Slack.

This template was created based on a survey with these questions:
1) Full Name
2) Email
3) Phone number
4) Describe your problem

You can use your own survey with different questions but you will need to update the mappings - especially in the Slack message body.
